title: 3 and Out - Deebo Trade Request, Pre-Draft Thoughts
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Deebo Trade Request, Pre-Draft Thoughts
description:
John discusses the Deebo Samuel trade request, if the Niners should get rid of him or offer him an extension, why the Dolphins never ending dysfunction is exhausting, what teams are doing in the final days leading up to the NFL Draft, and thoughts before teams go on the clock.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
